body.p: Paragraph 1.14 notes that some economic resources produce cash flows directly, whereas other economic resources are used in combination to produce cash flows. Building on this idea, the 2018 Conceptual Framework identifies as one factor in the selection of a measurement basis the way in which an asset or liability contributes to future cash flows.
